text: Pippa Middleton and James Matthews at Jons Bartholdson and Anna Ridderstad wedding in Stockholm, Sweden on June 10. Newlyweds Pippa Middleton and James Matthews made their first public appearance since their nuptials in May to attend a friend ’ s wedding in Stockholm, Sweden, on June 10. Holding hands and smiling, the couple, who have been honeymooning in Australia, were dressed to the nines for the occasion. The Duchess of Cambridge ’ s younger sister, 33, donned a beautiful black, white and floral silk ‘ Kenzie ’ gown from Erdem for the wedding of her friend, entrepreneur Jöns Bartholdson, who married Anna Ridderstad. Next to her, Matthews looked dapper in a black tux and black patent shoes, complete with a white bow
